title: Need Duo Queue players
body:
I am stuck in Bronze, I made it to Silver last season playing solo queue but it is nearly impossible now. I am ready to uninstall the game but I would like to give it one last shot. I know we all have bad games from time to time but I am looking for people to duo queue with (using curse as well) 

Add me in the game - League101

I am willing to try one last time to get out of bronze. If I play to my ability and play smart, I believe I should be top Silver maybe even lower Gold.

If you are a genuine player and learn from mistakes, plus if you are dedicated to getting out of bronze lets achieve that.
